body.section: Enabling WebSSO Horizon and Keystone now have an implementation of a Web Single Sign On Portal which provides the ability for a user to authenticate via a web browser with an external Identity Provider, through a Single Sign-On page. Setting up WebSSO manually is complex, therefore an ansible playbook was implemented and will be available in to ease the process of enabling WebSSO authentication. This type of authentication is disabled by default. The currently supported Identity Provider for WebSSO is ADFS (Active Directory Federation Services).
